bug.author: Echo9573
bug.description:
During my testing, I found that in the latest image, the shap interpretation and the local interpretation show inconsistencies. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/24820352/71468786-2ee49780-2802-11ea-8c80-f2d1a1171741.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/sql-machine-learning/sqlflow/files/4002021/housing-analyze-test-1226.html.zip>housing-analyze-test-1226.html.zip</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: It seems the model is underfitting or overfitting, can you paste the result metrics?
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/shendiaomo>@shendiaomo</denchmark-link> , please download the zip file , you can see the detail reproduced process.

I navigated the recent commit log and found out it is <denchmark-link:https://github.com/sql-machine-learning/sqlflow/pull/1469>#1469</denchmark-link> that caused the change. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Yancey1989>@Yancey1989</denchmark-link> Plz check out which figure is right.
